Bobath research bastardised by many well-meaning coaches & therapists: "I train movements NOT muscles"
@pjvazel I'd agree - singular lane focus, & constrained step length I'd say are biggest factors in this.

Time & place 4 isolationist 'muscle' training, 'correctives', and yes - nordics!
Though perhaps @das_shield would say nordics b4 movement!

If efficiency in the skill is inadequate, we may look at movement components to improve skill
Movement BEFORE muscles - not INSTEAD of
@christombs71 it's cold here dude!
@coachdunte then - once V & I reach rate of diminishing returns, further improvement due once again to ⬆️ mechanical efficiency
@coachdunte mechanics should determine intensity IMO. ⬆️ mechanics normally = ⬆️ speed. Add greater V & I once mechanics are stable
@coachdunte how many max speed runs do you think Jamaican kids do on their grass fields before showing up at bigger meets on tracks?
